Alexander Scriabin

Sept Préludes, op. 17

1895 (nos.4–7), 1896 (nos. 1–3)

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 11'

  • 1. D minor
  • 2. E-flat major
  • 3. D-flat major
  • 4. B-flat minor
  • 5. F minor
  • 6. B-flat major
  • 7. G minor

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/8 · Pieces · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Könemann · K 214 · Preludes II · ed. Victor Ekimovsky
